TopicTitle: A new member to these wonderful forums

Articles.Content:
Hello I\'m The Russian! I\'ve been playing Kerbal Space Program for quite some time now (not sure which version I played first) and have finally decided to join the community and I have recently purchased the newest update. I come from the Blockland Forums as with several others that I know/have seen (Gadgethm & Gojira). I am actually Russian but I moved to the US (specifically California) at six years old and unfortunately, as a result, reading and writing in Russian is a bit tough. On top of that, I don\'t know any of the modern slang used by Russians nowadays. I\'m mentioning this because I noticed that there is what seems like an extensive Russian community on these forums. I think KSP is absolutely brilliant and hope the devs keep up the great work.

Also, picture:

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
He has arrived! Welcome and enjoy your flights!
Welcome to the forums, enjoy your stay!

Welcome to the forums, enjoy your stay!

Assuming he ever leaves!

Anyway, welcome!

Assuming he ever leaves!

Anyway, welcome!

I hope not!

Also thank you everyone for the warm welcome.

???????!

??????o, ????!

(I spent like 5 minutes looking for the letters on my English keyboard. I really need Russian key stickers or something if I\'m to be on these forums.)
